item.title: 独家报道：摩科瑞集团和合作伙伴集团承诺投资美国能源，帮助瑞士降低关税
item.description: 两位接近此事的人士称，包括能源贸易商摩科瑞（Mercuria）和私募股权公司伙伴集团（Partners Group）在内的一批瑞士公司已承诺向美国能源投资超过60亿美元，作为降低美国对瑞士关税努力的一部分。【原文：A group of Swiss companies including energy trader Mercuria and private equity firm Partners Group has pledged over $6 billion in U.S. energy investments as part of efforts to lower U.S. tariffs on Switzerland, two people close to the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德再次呼吁加强欧元的作用
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周二再次呼吁加强欧元在全球的作用，她认为欧元集团现在是一个无辜的旁观者，承受着华盛顿和其他地方造成的冲击。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde renewed her call on Tuesday for a beefed-up global role for the euro currency, arguing that the bloc is now an innocent bystander, suffering shocks created in Washington and elsewhere.】

item.title: 投资金矿企业的基金价格屡创新高
item.description: 投资于金矿企业的共同基金在2025年表现领先，甚至超过了高歌猛进的人工智能和科技基金，因为投资者押注创纪录的金价将推动强劲的利润率、现金流和股东回报。【原文：Mutual funds that invest in gold mining firms are leading 2025 performance, overtaking even high-flying AI and tech funds, as investors bet record gold prices will drive strong margins, cashflows and shareholder returns.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚咖啡获得数十年来最佳收成，警告 2025/26 年收成将减少
item.description: 哥伦比亚全国咖啡种植者联合会周二表示，受有利的天气条件和作物更新的影响，哥伦比亚结束了三十多年来最好的咖啡年，但预计下一个周期的产量将有所下降。【原文：Colombia closed its best coffee year in more than three decades, boosted by favorable weather conditions and the impact of crop renewal, although production is expected to decline in the upcoming cycle, the National Federation of Coffee Growers said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国政府停摆将推迟公布 2026 年社会保障年度平均工资增幅
item.description: 数百万美国退休人员和其他社会保障金领取者将不得不等待一段时间才能知道 2026 年他们的支票会有多大，因为政府的部分停摆将推迟公布 9 月份的消费者通胀数据。【原文：Millions of U.S. retirees and other Social Security recipients will have to wait for a while to learn how big their checks will be in 2026 as the ongoing partial government shutdown is set to delay the release of September's consumer inflation data.】

item.title: 欧盟将钢铁进口配额减半以振兴国内产业
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二提议将免关税钢材进口配额削减近一半，并对超额货物征收 50%的关税，以保护欧盟的炼钢业。【原文：The European Commission proposed on Tuesday cutting tariff-free steel import quotas by almost half and a 50% duty for excess shipments in a bid to preserve viable steelmaking in the European Union.】

item.title: 网络犯罪分子声称日本朝日集团遭到黑客攻击
item.description: 周二，Qilin 声称对日本朝日集团控股公司遭黑客攻击事件负责，该事件中断了这家啤酒和饮料巨头的生产。【原文：Qilin, a ransomware group with a track record of cyberattacks on major entities around the world, claimed responsibility on Tuesday for a hack on Japan’s Asahi Group Holdings , which disrupted production at the beer and beverage giant.】

item.title: 第五第三银行首席执行官称 Comerica 交易将扩大在美国中间市场和增长地区的业务
item.description: 第五第三银行首席执行官蒂姆-斯彭斯（Tim Spence）周二在接受路透社采访时说，收购地区性银行 Comerica 的讨论始于几周前，当时后者的首席执行官柯蒂斯-法默（Curtis Farmer）打电话来商讨交易事宜。【原文：Fifth Third CEO Tim Spence said discussions to buy regional bank Comerica started a few weeks ago when the latter company's CEO Curtis Farmer called to discuss a deal, Spence told Reuters in an interview on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空客 A320 超越波音 737，成为历史上交付量最大的喷气式客机
item.description: 本周二，欧洲空中客车公司打破了一个重要的商业障碍，其 A320 系列飞机超越波音 737，成为历史上交付量最大的喷气式客机。【原文：Europe's Airbus broke a major commercial barrier on Tuesday when its A320 family of planes overtook the Boeing 737 to become the most-delivered jetliner in history.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现 9 月份对就业市场状况的担忧加剧
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周二发布的一份报告称，9月份美国人对就业市场的前景更加担忧，同时提高了对未来近期通胀路径的预测。【原文：Americans grew more worried about the future of the job market in September, while at the same time bumping up projections for the future path of near-term inflation, a report from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国银行业监管机构建议限制机构监督员的权力
item.description: 美国一家主要银行监管机构周二提出规则，限制银行审查员如何监督和处理贷款机构内部的缺陷，因为特朗普政府将继续努力控制银行业长期以来一直抱怨过于惩罚性的监管。【原文：A leading U.S. bank regulator proposed rules Tuesday that would limit how bank examiners can police and address shortcomings within lenders, as the Trump administration continued efforts to rein in supervision the banking industry has long complained is overly punitive.】

item.title: 乔巴尼敦促终止达能母公司的冷萃咖啡诉讼案
item.description: Chobani 敦促美国法官驳回竞争对手美国酸奶品牌达能（Dannon）的母公司达能提出的诉讼，达能声称 Chobani 抄袭了竞争产品线即饮冷萃咖啡的包装和 "明亮醇香 "的口号。【原文：Chobani urged a U.S. judge to dismiss a lawsuit by Danone, the parent of rival U.S. yogurt brand Dannon, claiming it copied the packaging and "Bright & Mellow" slogan for a competing line of ready-to-drink cold brew coffee.】

item.title: 陪审团裁定强生公司在滑石粉致癌案中负有责任，强生公司被勒令支付 9.66 亿美元
item.description: 周一晚些时候，洛杉矶的一个陪审团命令强生公司向一名死于间皮瘤的妇女的家属支付 9.66 亿美元，认定该公司在指控其婴儿爽身粉产品致癌的最新诉讼中负有责任。【原文：A Los Angeles jury late on Monday ordered Johnson & Johnson to pay $966 million to the family of a woman who died from mesothelioma, finding the company liable in the latest lawsuit alleging its baby powder products cause cancer.】

item.title: 欧元区部长研究如何促进欧元稳定币发行
item.description: 欧元区一位高级官员表示，欧元区各国财长将于周四讨论如何支持以欧元计价的稳定币的发展，以免这一快速增长的市场只留给美国。【原文：Euro zone finance ministers will discuss on Thursday how they can support the development of euro-denominated stablecoins so as not to leave the rapidly growing market only to the United States, a senior euro zone official said.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，波音将获得欧盟有条件批准 47 亿美元的 Spirit 交易
item.description: 波音公司以 47 亿美元收购美国精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）的交易将获得欧盟的反垄断批准，据直接知情人士透露，为消除欧盟的担忧，波音公司采取的补救措施预计将包括出售后者的部分业务。【原文：Boeing is set to gain EU antitrust approval for its $4.7 billion acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems , with remedies to address EU concerns expected to include sales of some of the latter's businesses, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 宝马公布第三季度销量增长，欧美市场表现强劲
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马（BMW）周二报告称，受欧洲和美国市场表现的提振，该公司今年第三季度的销售额有所上升。【原文：German carmaker BMW reported on Tuesday rising sales in the third quarter of the year, lifted by its performance in Europe and in the United States.】

item.title: 报告称全球可再生能源发电量首次超过煤炭发电量
item.description: 智库 Ember 周二发布的一份报告显示，在中国和印度快速增长的推动下，2025 年上半年全球可再生能源发电量首次超过煤炭发电量。【原文：Renewable energy sources generated more electricity than coal globally for the first time in the first half of 2025, driven by rapid growth in China and India, a report by think tank Ember showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 雪佛龙任命凯文-麦克拉克兰为勘探副总裁
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）周二任命凯文-麦克拉克兰（Kevin McLachlan）为勘探副总裁，接替将于明年初退休的资深高管利兹-施瓦泽（Liz Schwarze）。【原文：Chevron Corp on Tuesday named Kevin McLachlan as vice president of exploration, succeeding veteran executive Liz Schwarze, who will retire early next year after more than three decades with the U.S. oil major.】

item.title: 世贸组织将明年全球贸易增长预期下调至 0.5
item.description: 世界贸易组织周二将其对 2026 年全球商品贸易量增长的预测大幅下调至 0.5%，理由是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税预期会产生延迟影响。【原文：The World Trade Organization on Tuesday sharply lowered its 2026 forecast for global merchandise trade volume growth to 0.5%, citing expected delayed impacts from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 高通公司收购开源电子公司 Arduino
item.description: 高通公司（Qualcomm）周二表示，它已经收购了意大利一家非营利公司 Arduino，该公司生产用于开发机器人和其他电子小工具原型的硬件和软件。【原文：Qualcomm on Tuesday said it has acquired Arduino, an Italian not-for-profit firm that makes hardware and software for developing prototypes of robots and other electronic gadgets.】

item.title: 欧洲奢侈品股上涨，创意产品首次亮相带来销售回暖的希望
item.description: 周二，欧洲奢侈品公司股价上涨，将欧洲奢侈品指数推升至今年 5 月底以来的最高水平，因为时装公司的首次设计亮相和对经济实惠的推动，给投资者带来了该行业将逐步回暖的希望。【原文：Shares of European luxury players rose on Tuesday, pushing the European luxuries index to its highest level since late May this year, as designing debuts among fashion houses and a push for affordability gave investors hope that the sector was set for a gradual comeback.】

item.title: 人工智能服务器需求强劲，戴尔上调长期年度收入和利润增长预期
item.description: 戴尔周二上调了长期营收和利润增长预期，表明市场对其支持人工智能工作负载的服务器需求强劲，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨近 7%。【原文：Dell raised its long-term revenue and profit growth forecasts on Tuesday, signaling robust demand for its servers that power artificial intelligence workloads, sending its shares up nearly 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 意大利家庭因儿童安全问题将矛头指向 Facebook、Instagram 和 TikTok
item.description: 一群意大利家庭对 Facebook、Instagram 和 TikTok 提起诉讼，指控这些平台未能执行年龄限制，并使用伤害儿童心理健康的成瘾功能。【原文：A group of Italian families has filed a lawsuit against Facebook, Instagram and TikTok, accusing the platforms of failing to enforce age restrictions and using addictive features that harm children's mental health.】

item.title: 麦考密克季度业绩超预期，因关税问题下调年度利润预期
item.description: 麦考密克周二公布的第三季度销售额和利润超出预期，这主要得益于对其价格较高的香料和调味料的强劲需求，尽管宏观经济的不确定性笼罩着消费者支出。【原文：McCormick on Tuesday beat expectations for third-quarter sales and profit, aided by resilient demand for its higher-priced spices and seasonings even as macroeconomic uncertainty loomed over consumer spending.】

item.title: 受中国和美国拖累，梅赛德斯-奔驰第三季度销量下滑
item.description: 本周二，梅赛德斯-奔驰公司公布了第三季度销售额下降的报告，原因是美国的进口关税和中国市场竞争的加剧削弱了这家德国豪华汽车制造商的交付能力。【原文：Mercedes-Benz reported declining sales for the third quarter on Tuesday, as U.S. import duties and intensifying competition in China dented the German luxury carmaker's deliveries.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商购买了价值 380 亿美元的美国及盟国工具，法律界人士认为这是政策失效的迹象
item.description: 根据美国国会两党议员的一项调查，美国及其盟国在限制中国制造先进计算芯片的能力方面存在漏洞，这使得中国得以购买近 400 亿美元的尖端芯片制造设备。【原文：Gaps in efforts by the U.S. and allies to restrict China's ability to manufacture advanced computing chips have allowed China to buy nearly $40 billion of sophisticated chipmaking gear, according to a bipartisan investigation by U.S. lawmakers.】

item.title: 凯雷发布影子劳工报告，显示 9 月份美国招聘低迷
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）周二公布了一组美国经济数据，其中包括大幅调低的 9 月份就业增长预估值，这凸显了私营企业在政府停摆导致官方统计数据停滞不前的情况下提供见解的努力。【原文：Carlyle Group released a set of U.S. economic data on Tuesday, including a sharply lower estimate for September jobs growth, underscoring efforts by private firms to provide insights as the government shutdown stalls official statistics.】

item.title: 渣打银行任命罗伯托-霍恩韦格（Roberto Hoornweg）为企业与投资银行部主管
item.description: 渣打银行周二表示，已任命罗伯托-霍恩韦格（Roberto Hoornweg）为企业与投资银行业务首席执行官，将他从与苏尼尔-考沙尔（Sunil Kaushal）共同担任的联合主管职位上提升了一级。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Tuesday it appointed Roberto Hoornweg as chief executive of corporate and investment banking, elevating him from the co-head role he shared with Sunil Kaushal.】

item.title: OpenAI 禁止疑似与中国有关联的账户寻求监控建议
item.description: OpenAI 周二表示，在用户提出监控社交媒体对话的建议后，它已封禁了几个疑似与中国政府实体有关联的 ChatGPT 账户。【原文：OpenAI said on Tuesday it has banned several ChatGPT accounts with suspected links to the Chinese government entities after the users asked for proposals to monitor social media conversations.】

item.title: 解说：在美国政府关门之际，企业如何引导 IPO 计划
item.description: 希望避免因美国政府停摆而影响其首次公开募股的公司可以利用一项条款，该条款允许这些公司在无需监管部门批准的情况下推进其上市计划。【原文：Companies looking to sidestep disruptions caused by the U.S. government shutdown to their initial public offerings can tap a provision that allows them to press ahead with their listing plans without the need for regulatory approvals.】
